front.title: Multisegment Pseudowires in Passive Optical Networks

abstract.t: This draft describes MS-PW application in a PON network. Static configuration of one segment of PW is a typical case of MS-PW. When MS-PW is implemented in a PON network, the large quantity of T-PE makes such static provisioning a heavy burden of network manager. Making use of management protocol of GPON helps to reduce the labor of configuration, simplify and speedup the PW provision procedure to a great extent, and notify to switching PE (OLT) ACs status on T-PE (ONU). Link layer of GPON may also replace PSN to carry MPLS-PW.
